summary:
!!NOT COMPATIBLE WITH DAWNGUARD!!
This mod removes the invisible borders and allows you to explore all areas which are integrated by Bethesda (basically they are Cyrodiil and Morrowind without towns and NPCs).
Please make a backup of your savegame before you launch the mod, crashes are possible!
The screenshots show how the landscape actually lo
descriptionHtml:
!!NOT COMPATIBLE WITH DAWNGUARD!!
As many of you might know, Bethesda has integrated some parts of Morrowind\'s and Cyrodiil\'s landscape in Skyrim. This mod removes the borders completely (no \".ini\"-modification) and makes you able to enter them.
At the moment the possibilities to use these regions are limited because at certain points you fall through the ground.
If you need a translation, please send me the name of Skyrim in your language and I\'ll make a version in your language.
You can also find this mod in the Steam Workshop:
http://bit.ly/w19gUm
author: Da Bozz

files.name: v1_0
